Texts.Chs: 对绘世者家乡诺昆斯加特的描述。
Texts.Eng: A depiction of the Skath homeworld Norkumsgath.

Texts.Chs: 展示绘世者世界的展览。
Texts.Eng: A display showin' the Skath world.

Texts.Chs: 啊，诺库姆斯加特，我的出生地。世界上真正的宝石。该委员会的总部设在那里。
Texts.Eng: Ah, Norkumsgath, the birthplace of my kind. A true jewel among worlds. The council has their headquarters there.

Texts.Chs: 叶族人发现了水龙星球。看起来像鱼脸星球。
Texts.Eng: Floran seesss waterdragon planet. Lookss like fishface planet.

Texts.Chs: 我听说没有人去过绘世者的家乡。难怪，他们的轨道武器。
Texts.Eng: I hear no one's ever visited the Skath homeworld. No wonder, with all their orbital weapons.

Texts.Chs: 这就是绘世者的家园？我从来没有听说过任何非绘世者被允许访问。
Texts.Eng: So this is the Skath homeworld? I've never heard of any non-Skath being permitted to visit.

Texts.Chs: 绘世者家园看起来很美，但一点也不像阿沃斯。
Texts.Eng: The Skath homeworld looks beautiful, and yet nothing like Avos.

Texts.Chs: 绘世者家园似乎只有20%是陆地，只有一个大洋。
Texts.Eng: The Skath homeworld seems to be only 20% land, and one great ocean.

Texts.Chs: 绘世者种族的摇篮...我想家。
Texts.Eng: The cradle of the Skath race... I feel homesick.
